parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Who, which, what, why. Probably emphatic of tis; an interrogative pronoun, who, which or what.

parse: Verb - Perfect Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular

str2: A woman, wife, my lady. Probably from the base of ginomai; a woman; specially, a wife.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Active - 2nd Person Singular
str2: To save, heal, preserve, rescue. From a primary sos; to save, i.e. Deliver or protect.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
A male human being; a man, husband. A primary word; a man.
Or, than. A primary particle of distinction between two connected terms; disjunctive, or; comparative, than.
